data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Équateur, Democratic Republic of the Congo a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Équateur, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, convict the 1,441,672 believers in Équateur to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Équateur, Democratic Republic of the Congo. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Équateur words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Équateur, Democratic Republic of the Congo.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Équateur, Democratic Republic of the Congo to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Father, help the stressed and anxious in Équateur, Democratic Republic of the Congo know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.focus_label: Équateur, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary:
the state of Équateur, Democratic Republic of the Congo has a population of 7,500,000.

We estimate Équateur has 1,441,672 people who might know Jesus, 5,431,860 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 626,467 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.
